sentences.sContent: It was an illiterate letter, full of mistakes.
sentences.sCn: 这封信文笔拙劣，错误连篇。

synos.tran: 文盲的；不识字的；没受教育的

remMethod.val: il(不) + literate(识字的) → 不识字的 → 文盲

trans.tranCn: 文盲的；不识字的；没受教育的
trans.tranOther: someone who is illiterate has not learned to read or write
someone who has not learned to read or write
